1: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הַגִּתִּ֬ית <sup>1665 </sup> <n>upon Gittith</n> לְאָסָֽף׃ <sup>623 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of Asaph</n> הַ֭רְנִינוּ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>Sing aloud</n> לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto God</n> עוּזֵּ֑נוּ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>our strength</n> הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>make a joyful noise</n> לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto the God</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
2: שְֽׂאוּ־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Take</n> זִ֭מְרָה <sup>2172 </sup> <n>a psalm</n> וּתְנוּ־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and bring</n> תֹ֑ף <sup>8596 </sup> <n>hither the timbrel</n> כִּנּ֖וֹר <sup>3658 </sup> <n>harp</n> נָעִ֣ים <sup>5273 </sup> <n>the pleasant</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> נָֽבֶל׃ <sup>5035 </sup> <n>with the psaltery</n>
3: תִּקְע֣וּ <sup>8628 </sup> <n>Blow up</n> בַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>in the new moon</n> שׁוֹפָ֑ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>the trumpet</n> בַּ֝כֵּ֗סֶה <sup>3677 </sup> <n>in the time appointed</n> לְי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> חַגֵּֽנוּ׃ <sup>2282 </sup> <n>on our solemn feast</n>
4: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>is a</n> חֹ֣ק <sup>2706 </sup> <n>For this [was] a statute</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>for Israel</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מִ֝שְׁפָּ֗ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>[and] a law</n> לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>of the God</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
5: עֵ֤דוּת ׀ <sup>5715 </sup> <n>[for] a testimony</n> בִּֽיה֘וֹסֵ֤ף <sup>3084 </sup> <n>in Joseph</n> שָׂמ֗וֹ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>This he ordained</n> בְּ֭צֵאתוֹ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>when he went out</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>throughout</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>through the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> שְׂפַ֖ת <sup>8193 </sup> <n>a language</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדַ֣עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[that] I understood</n> אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[where] I heard</n>
6: הֲסִיר֣וֹתִי <sup>5493 </sup> <n>I removed</n> מִסֵּ֣בֶל <sup>5447 </sup> <n>from the burden</n> שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <sup>7926 </sup> <n>his shoulder</n> כַּ֝פָּ֗יו <sup>3709 </sup> <n>his hands</n> מִדּ֥וּד <sup>1731 </sup> <n>from the pots</n> תַּעֲבֹֽרְנָה׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>were delivered</n>
7: בַּצָּרָ֥ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>in trouble</n> קָרָ֗אתָ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Thou calledst</n> וָאֲחַ֫לְּצֶ֥ךָּ <sup>2502 </sup> <n>and I delivered</n> אֶ֭עֶנְךָ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>thee I answered</n> בְּסֵ֣תֶר <sup>5643 </sup> <n>thee in the secret place</n> רַ֑עַם <sup>7482 </sup> <n>of thunder</n> אֶבְחָֽנְךָ֨ <sup>974 </sup> <n>I proved</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> מֵ֖י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>thee at the waters</n> מְרִיבָ֣ה <sup>4809 </sup> <n>of Meribah</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
8: שְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> עַ֭מִּי <sup>5971 </sup> <n>O my people</n> וְאָעִ֣ידָה <sup>5749 </sup> <n>and I will testify</n> בָּ֑ךְ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto thee O Israel</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> תִּֽשְׁמַֽע־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>if thou wilt hearken</n> לִֽי׃
9: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Let there be no</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְ֭ךָ אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>god</n> זָ֑ר <sup>2114 </sup> <n>There shall no strange</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <sup>7812 </sup> <n>be in thee neither shalt thou worship</n> לְאֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>god</n> נֵכָֽר׃ <sup>5236 </sup> <n>any strange</n>
10: אָנֹכִ֨י ׀ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יְה֘וָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> הַֽ֭מַּעַלְךָ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>which brought</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thee out of the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> הַרְחֶב־ <sup>7337 </sup> <n>wide</n> פִּ֝֗יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>open thy mouth</n> וַאֲמַלְאֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and I will fill</n>
11: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>would not hearken</n> עַמִּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>But my people</n> לְקוֹלִ֑י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>to my voice</n> וְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> אָ֥בָה <sup>14 </sup> <n>would</n> לִֽי׃
12: וָֽ֭אֲשַׁלְּחֵהוּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>So I gave them up</n> בִּשְׁרִיר֣וּת <sup>8307 </sup> <n>lust</n> לִבָּ֑ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>unto their own hearts'</n> יֵ֝לְכ֗וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to walk</n> בְּֽמוֹעֲצוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4156 </sup> <n>in their own counsels</n>
13: ל֗וּ <sup>3863 </sup> <n>Oh</n> עַ֭מִּי <sup>5971 </sup> <n>that my people</n> שֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>had hearkened</n> לִ֑י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto me [and] Israel</n> בִּדְרָכַ֥י <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in my ways</n> יְהַלֵּֽכוּ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>had walked</n>
14: כִּ֭מְעַט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>I should soon</n> אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>their enemies</n> אַכְנִ֑יעַ <sup>3665 </sup> <n>have subdued</n> וְעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> צָ֝רֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>6862 </sup> <n>against their adversaries</n> אָשִׁ֥יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and turned</n> יָדִֽי׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>my hand</n>
15: מְשַׂנְאֵ֣י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>The haters</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יְכַֽחֲשׁוּ־ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>should have submitted</n> ל֑וֹ וִיהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>to Him</n> עִתָּ֣ם <sup>6256 </sup> <n>themselves unto him but their time</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>should have endured for ever</n>
16: וַֽ֭יַּאֲכִילֵהוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>He should have fed</n> מֵחֵ֣לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>them also with the finest</n> חִטָּ֑ה <sup>2406 </sup> <n>of the wheat</n> וּ֝מִצּ֗וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>out of the rock</n> דְּבַ֣שׁ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and with honey</n> אַשְׂבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>should I have satisfied</n>
